thread.title: Doug Murray
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Doug Murray

author: Doug Murray
title: Doug Murray
text: Solar is now a crowded market with lots of choices and to the uninitiated quite confusing. You might even be tempted by one of the many advertisements on TV. Solar Quote: s clears the forest and presents you with 3 choices, personalised to your area and requirements and all highly professional in my experience. The Solar Choices site also helps to explain the technology and rates the products on offer. They also follow up to ensure you got your Quote: s and were happy with the choices presented. For a potentially large investment like solar I can't recommend Solar Quote: s highly enough as the place to start.
